item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 19, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Have you ever seen soldering this close? [video] (224 points | 39 comments)
2. Nintendo Files Suit for Infringement of Patent Rights Against Pocketpair, Inc (118 points | 81 comments)
3. Is Tor still safe to use? (400 points | 297 comments)
4. Why wordfreq will not be updated (1368 points | 405 comments)

23. OpenTelemetry and vendor neutrality: how to build an observability strategy (62 points | 16 comments)

25. iOS 18 breaks IMAPS self-signed certs (48 points | 72 comments)
26. J2ME-Loader: J2ME emulator for Android devices (10 points | discuss)
27. Apple mobile processors are now made in America by TSMC (1487 points | 765 comments)

29. The Dune Shell (180 points | 59 comments)
30. Launch HN: Cerebrium (YC W22) – Serverless Infrastructure Platform for ML/AI (39 points | 26 comments)
